::DrillBit::

He looked at the new comers.
"We're going to take out Megatron and his troops. The ships internal
defences are locked on to them and should be shooting now."
He turned to Killfest.
"It's time. With the internal defences we just have to go finish them
off. should I order the troops to attack?"
